Name: Will it rain on my ride?
Description: Final project for CS50 2023. Will it Rain on My Ride is a minimalist tool for checking the weather forecasts along a planned trip. It is a Python-based web app deployed with Flask that uses the Openroute Services and tha Open-meteo APIs for navigation and weather forecast.

Name: Interactive portfolio
Description: This very tool! An interactive portfolio for showcasing Architecture, Code and Urban planning projects. Made for Harvard's CS50 2023

Name: App-repositories
Description: Android app developed for the Inter Android Developer bootcamp. View a users public repositories list from the Github API. Follows recommended Android Architecture practices and employs MVVM, Retrofit, Navigation Components, Koin dependency injection, Clean Architecture. Expressive documentation.

Name: BusinessCard app
Description: Android app developed for the Inter Android Developer bootcamp. A full CRUD business card list with responsive search and a card sharing feature. Employs the recommended Android Architecture practices and technologies: MVVM, Room Database, Navigation, Koin dependency injection, expressive documentation.

Name: C贸riaPay App
Description: Developed as part of a codelab, this mobile app simulates a popular Brazilian electronic payment and peer-to-peer money transfer platform. Employs JWT Authentication, MVVM, Navigation, Koin dependency injection, Clean Architecture.

Name: C贸riaPay API
Description: A 100% Kotlin RESTful API to support the C贸riaPay App, built on the Spring Boot platform according to Clean Architecture principles, it employs Spring data JDBC, Jpa Hibernate, PosgreSQL, Swagger.

Name: AstraNovos
Description: This SpaceFlightNews API client has been developed as part of an ongoing tutorial series on Clean Architecture, Dependency Injection with Koin and connection with web services using Retrofit. Employs MVVM, Navigation, Koin dependency injection, Clean Architecture, Kotlin Flow, Room Database automated testing.

Name: SESS - Simple E-bus System Simulation
Description: A tool for evaluating bus fleet electrification scenarios, based on best practices for e-bus operations planning, service block building, driving range estimation and bus dispatch strategies. Developed in Kotlin, it employs the Compose Multiplatform in a Desktop setting.

Name: CaAntiga App
Description: Ca_antiga is an interactive color selection tool for historic buildings which employs custom View objects to simulate the color application. Color compositions can be created manually or randomly generated with an original algorithm based on the traditional color selection and combination for each architectonic period and style. It also allows users to save and share their favorite compositions, as well as accessing information about the styles of historical Brazilian architecture.

Name: Afonso Pena Airport (Curitiba, Brazil)
Description: Oversight and compatibilization of architecture designs for the renewal and expansion of the passenger terminal (over 100,000 sq.m and 5000 design documents). Assessment and oversight of design and construction of the parking garage building.

Name: Foz do Iguassu Airport
Description: Conceptual studies and writing of procurement documentation (specifications and legal tender) for the renewal and expansion of the passenger terminal.

Name: Vit贸ria Airport
Description: Conceptual studies for operational and commercial update of an existing architecture design, including review for compliance with current fire prevention and accessibility regulations. Writing of procurement documentation (specifications and legal tender) for the renewal and expansion of the passenger terminal.

Name: Armazem Macedo (Antonina, Brazil)
Description: Restoration of a historic building on the waterfront of Antonina with a modern annex for use as a cultural center. Writing of procurement documentation (specifications and legal tender); budget review and analysis. Management of the restoration and construction contract.

Name: Cycling Infrastructure (Curitiba, Brazil)
Description: Cycleways planning, design review, budget analysis and writing of procurement specifications.

Name: Shared bike system
Description: Assessment of bike station locations and deployment strategies in close collaboration with the commercial partner

Name: Neighborhood network analysis
Description: Assesment of origin-destination survey data for the city of Curitiba to understand relations between the citys neighborhoods
